about_the_game: Unlock the tantalising and extra tasty scenes with the unique ladies found in this romantic visual novel! With this patch you will access the adult scenes in the game featuring the intimate scenes with the women in this game!

content_descriptors.notes: This patch unlocks the 18+ content for the game. This content consists of scenes depicting consensual and romantic sexual relations between lesbian women.
